text.headline: Putin's war on civilians
text.text: Images and videos verified by open-source investigators shed light on the suffering of ordinary Ukrainians.

media.caption: The aftermath of a deadly attack on a Mariupol hospital

text.headline: World leaders have condemned Russia's air strike on a hospital in the port city of Mariupol.
text.text: Russia initially denied attacking the hospital, but has since admitted that it was targeted while falsely maintaining that the casualties were staged. The airstrike killed three people (including a child) and injured 17 more, according to Ukrainian authorities.

media.caption: Damaged buildings in central Mariupol, including Pryazovskyi State Technical University

text.headline: The Russian-speaking city has been under siege by the Russian military since 24 February.
text.text: Parts of the city centre, including the city's university, have been reduced to rubble by artillery and air strikes.

media.caption: Building with a pharmacy hit by strike in Mariupol.
